title: Credit Card Nicknames
content: As a user, when creating and using a saved credit card, I'd like the opportunity to provide it a nickname. This would make it easier to distinguish if multiple cards are saved. This doesn't seem to be available.
creator: d.angeles84

title: Passwords & Bookmarks are gone
content: I clicked to make Firefox my default browser and now all of my saved passwords & bookmarks are gone. Where did they go?
creator: vlcapozziello

title: How do I enable javascript? I can't get into any of my banking or normal websites? Not sure if a Firefox extension caused this?
content: I would like assistance to enable javascript. Chase bank says in orderto perform activities, I need javascript. So, do other sites. I never had this problem before 2 weeks ago. Not sure what is causing this. I tried following instructions online that said I had to get to Firebox 'configure' box, but the instructions were too vague, bc I didn't see the prompters they said I should choose from? Please advise. Thanks!
creator: ivov1

title: Hover over menu doesn't show up in some websites (even after changing settings in about:config)
content:
Hi, I've had this issue since I installed firefox on my current computer. The hover menu shows up on Youtube and some other video websites, but not on Twitter for example.

I followed what a forum post here said about dom.w3c_touch_events.enabled and HID touch interface, neither did anything for me (I don't even have a HID touch interface device on my list, not even hidden).

Need some help :P
creator: kydlewastaken
